prompts: Create a playful bipedal Pokemon that wears a bone helmet and has a unique tail.
Show me an adorable ground-type Pokemon with a gray body and orange accents.
Imagine a small Pokemon that loves to explore caves and has a shy personality.
Generate a Pokemon that is always seen carrying a bone, symbolizing its connection to family.
Design a creature that thrives in mountainous regions and has a tough exterior.
Make a Pokemon that beautifully blends gray, orange, and white colors in its design.
Give me a ground-type Pokemon that has a distinctive look due to its unique skull mask.
